Dialogs.Dialog: 小早川
Wow, so crowded.
I think people are looking for a place to relax. There are families that bring lunch boxes here too.
Family's lunch boxes, huh...
▲小早川＊▲？
Isn't that good？ I think it's not a bad idea.
(I guess she's getting along well with her family now...)
小早川
Walking around here makes me feel like we're traveling through time.
These trees grow day by day, huh？
Being close to nature like this, we can notice all the season changes.
It would be nice if we could stay here watching this forever.
...What are you saying？ Are you an idiot？
It's good to go for a vacation somewhere, but just relaxing here is nice, too.
小早川
Relaxing, huh？
Actually, you were thinking about flirting with me and stuff, right？
That's...
Let's just relax here then.
...Okay.
When you come to the shrine, do you feel like someone or something is watching us all the time？
小早川
Yeah, right. Speaking of which, one time I was trying to play a prank with the shrine's archway.
Did you get cursed after that？
Yeah, the shrine keeper found out and forced me to sweep the shrine's ground. I still wonder how he could see me.
(I didn't mean it that way though...)
小早川
A shrine, huh？ There are a lot of insects here all year round...
Do you feel like catching some insects now？
Do you think I'm a child！？ If you want to, do it by yourself.
If I do so, this won't be like a date...
If you know that, try suggesting something more suitable for a date. I might join you then.
Do you want to draw a fortune？
小早川
I don't mind doing that.
Bad luck... ▲小早川＊▲, how's yours？
Hah...
Don't feel down！ Let's tie our fortune together to drive away bad luck！
Why？ Look, I got the "excellent luck" one.
Well then, you should've acted a bit happier.
But I can't get any better fortune after I got this one. Hah... This is boring.
(I should be the one who feels disappointed...)
小早川
Right, this movie...
Did you know it？
They changed the title so I didn't recognize it at first, but I've read the original novel.
Huh？ Really？
The scenes and story are pretty unique so I noticed it. They did pretty well for this.
(Seems like I chose the right movie this time.)
小早川
Well, it was so-so, I think.
It wasn't fun？
It was better than I thought. But I didn't expect much to begin with, so I didn't feel disappointed.
Such a negative opinion.
For a movie, that much is enough for me to care about.
小早川
Why would people give "Thumbs-up" or "No.1 at U.S. Box Office" or "I'm so impressed" opinions for such a movie？
...It was a failure.
Well, it's fine that we waste our time with something worthless like this occasionally, right？
Is it really okay？
Sometimes you can gain something from living a futile life, right？
(Does that have positive or negative meaning...？)
小早川
I'm so bad at bowling, aren't I？
I think the ball is too heavy for you.
...Really？ That's why my arm is getting sore...
...Why don't you use the children's ball then？
No, that's so uncool. It's against my policy.
(So obstinate.)
小早川
When we get 2 strikes in a row, it's called "double," right？
Yeah, and for 3 strikes in a row, it's called "turkey."
Why is that？ Turkey as a type of bird？
There are many theories about this, but I don't know which one is true.
Well, never mind. If I can make a turkey, you tell me then.
(But I don't know...)
小早川
Phew, it's quite fun to play bowling once I get used to it.
It would be more enjoyable if I could sweep all the pins though. Maybe I should use a heavier ball.
You can't carry a heavy ball.
Then I'll use both hands... No, that would be so uncool.
(You care more about being cool than having fun, huh？)
小早川
Hm, that was quite fun.
There were recent artists too.
Yeah, their live performances were nice. Anyway, most of the bands that I like are already disbanded.
Really？ What a pity.
VThere were those legendary concerts that I wanted to watch. I wish I were born sooner.
小早川
47 points.
Such an odd score...
Anyone who gets 40 points from me can be proud. Add 20 points to my score and it can be world critics' standard.
Then as a guy that ▲小早川＊▲ chose, I can be proud, right？
...For that statement, I give you 7 points.
(It's not out of 10, isn't it...？)
小早川
You don't like it？
I wish we could leave this place as soon as possible.
My bad.
It's not just you. It's the whole society that approves something like this. You're not the only one to be blamed.
(But I'm one of those to be blamed, right...？)
小早川
Teeheehee. You know what will happen when you take Rinko to the karaoke box, right？
What will happen？
Of course, we'll sing only Western songs. I won't sing any cheesy J-POP songs, you know？
...Don't be too harsh on me.
Well, what should I sing first？ I'm really good at this. You'll be surprised.
(She's so pumped up... I think it's fine as long as she enjoys it.)
小早川
When we come to a karaoke box like this, we can see what the people before us sang, right？
Yeah, we can see the records.
Huh？ What are these？ They are all duets and love songs.
Why did a couple come to a karaoke box？ And can't they just sing regular songs？
(And what about us？ What are we...？)
小早川
Well, what am I gonna sing today？
Can we sing something besides Western songs occasionally？
Eh？ For example...
Since we're already here, how about some popular love songs？
No, that's the worst. No way！ I object. ...Here, let's sing this song.
(Huh？ This is an English love song... I think.)
小早川
The Ferris wheel just keeps going round and round. I was wondering what was so fun about it.
And？
Once I tried it, it was pretty fun.
I'm happy that you like it.
Why are you being happy？ I'm praising the Ferris wheel. Since when did you become the Ferris wheel, huh？
小早川
The Ferris wheel is wonderful. The feelings are different during the daytime and the nighttime.
The feelings are different？
See. During the daytime, people bring their families and have some fun. Then at nighttime...
It has different mood, right？
Even for the couples that don't intend for such a mood, they will feel it too.
For that... Well, we'll know if we try, right？
小早川
It's kind of dumb, isn't it？ This stuff.
It really felt like they were trying to scare you, but rather, don't you think it wasn't even scary？
You're saying that now, but weren't you holding onto me tightly when we were in there？
That was an act. My special service. Hehe, did I fool you？
(Seriously！？)
小早川
Geez！ Why is it so dark！？ It's hard to walk！
Because it's a haunted house.
You might expect me to scream, "Kyaa！ It's dark！ I'm scared！" and cling to you, but it's never gonna happen.
Kyaa！ It's dark！ I'm scared！！
Even so, don't... say it！
Ouch！
小早川
There's that sign, "If you are shorter than me, you can't ride this" at the entrance.
I've felt so irritated with that picture since a long time ago.
It's there to show the height restriction, isn't it？
That's right！ But... I felt like it was looking down on me every time！
It was looking down...？
That's why ever since I've grown taller than it, I always walked there and looked down on it.
(A sore loser... huh？)
小早川
For a roller coaster, the most exciting moment is when it's getting close to the summit, right？
Right. After that, everything goes by in an instant.
The excitement when we go up to the peak and then unleash all our feelings is like a catharsis, huh？
You don't have to think of such a theory...
Kyaaaaaa！
小早川
Wow... Amazing...
This is the amusement park's special program.
This is like a real fairyland.
Fairyland...？
Wait... No！ It's just... Geez！
I agree with you.
小早川
Wow... Their electricity bill must cost a lot...
...What a strange reaction. You don't like this then？
It's not like that. I think it's very beautiful！
Then why are you concerned about the electricity bill？
That's because I was just wondering... Can you not make me feel any more awkward！？
(Seems like she enjoys it then.)
小早川
So beautiful...
Yeah, I agree.
It would be nice if we could stop time right here...
Eh？
Hehe. Are you expecting something...？
(...Was she serious？)
小早川
Hehe.
You are in such a good mood, ▲小早川＊▲.
Unlike the sea, the swimming pool has walls. I can put this swim ring on and float around without worrying.
Yeah, you can enjoy your time like that.
Ah, but that doesn't mean I can't swim without this swim ring.
I didn't say that. But you must be careful. Don't let it topple over and fall, okay？
I said that I can swim, didn't you hear！？
小早川
Yeah, it sure is nice to swim in the pool. This is very well designed.
But the sea also has its good points.
But sea water is salty.
That's true though.
If you choke, sea water would feel more terrible.
(You mean in case of drowning？)
小早川
...I was in such high spirits that I'm now exhausted. I'm sleepy.
Hey, don't fall asleep while you're standing like that.
But~
Come on. Go change your clothes. I'll wait here.
Okay~
(She becomes obedient when she's sleepy, huh？)
小早川
I tried to listen to the narration attentively.
But you forgot about it in no time, right？
Right, right. I can't remember the stars' configurations or their names.
This way, whenever you come here, everything you hear will always sound like new information to you.
You are so happy-go-lucky...
小早川
Hey, have you been looking at the stars lately？
No.
Right. People these days get too busy to glance up at the sky.
Yet they invented something like this so that they could see fake stars. Ah, life is tough.
Does it mean you don't like to come to this place？
...That's not the case. Sorry, Rinko didn't really mean to say that.
小早川
For the stars, it takes them some million or billion years until their lights reach us and we can see them, right？
The light from our star will reach other stars in some billion years and someone out there might see it.
That sounds wonderful...
Will someone be able to see us, too？ I wonder how they will see us. Hmm？
Somehow this is embarrassing.
But we aren't doing anything embarrassing now.
小早川
Whenever I come here, I'm always amazed with how many types of flowers there are.
Not just flowers, there are also rare plants and grasses here as well.
Ah, that flower has such a weird shape.
Weird shape...？ I don't think the flower would be happy to hear you say that, really.
Ah, this high school guy right here is making such a weird face.
...I don't think the high school guy is happy to hear you say that... Really.
小早川
Plants also have their scientific names besides their common names, right？ Do you remember them？
There's no need to remember, is there？
But they are such complicated names. Don't you feel challenged to remember them？
Challenged？ By whom？
Then let me make it a challenge for us. Let's see how many we can remember.
(By the time I reach home, I'll surely forget all of them.)
小早川
...It's hot.
Yeah, it's the subtropical plants' corner after all.
It's very unfortunate that Rinko doesn't have any passion for the flowers here.
Goodbye. I think I'll never see them ever again.
Don't exaggerate.
I'm leaving. Do you want me to say goodbye to you, too？
I got it, I got it.
小早川
I really had fun... But did you get bored？
Not at all, why？
I had so much fun that I was worrying whether it was just me.
I said that it's not the case. I also had some fun.
Really？ Then it's good. Hehe.
小早川
Hmm, I've never been to this kind of show. If I were alone, I would never have a chance to watch it.
Really？ Then that's good.
Whether it's good or not, that's another question...
▲小早川＊▲, if I could make you enjoy it just a little bit, that would make bringing you here worth it.
Ah~！ No, Rinko doesn't easily get influenced by a guy！
小早川
...I'm exhausted.
You don't like it？
It was just too crowded. Can't you think of some place else to go？
Sorry.
I'm just too exhausted to give you a kick. Your life is safe for today.
小早川
Whoa, it's windy...！
We're very close to the ocean.
I wonder if that bridge was shaking...
I don't think so.
Ah, that thing is the famous date spot, right？ Is it what's called a suspension bridge？
Suspension bridge？ It's more like a normal bridge that is curving down.
小早川
Why do couples like to come here？ Because the night view is beautiful and romantic？ Ah, come on. Answer me.
It's called a perfect date spot, but it doesn't feel any different from when I came here alone.
Yeah, when you say so, I can feel that our thoughts are pretty much alike.
Now then, what are we gonna do？
Since we're already here, let's take a stroll. For you, I can at least pretend to have fun.
小早川
We shouldn't walk across this bridge.
What？
Somehow that's what I thought.
That means... you're fine if we walk up to the middle of the bridge？
We would be run over. There are car lanes, right？
...That's right.
小早川
What's your general impression of the ocean？
Beach volleyball, watermelon crush, sandpit...
No. I'm not going to do anything unproductive like that.
It has to be something like... eating fried noodles.
(I doubt that's what you can call "productive"...)
小早川
Ah, people are building sand castles？ Why do they come to the ocean to play with sand and not get in the ocean？
Well, they might be playing on the beach before sea bathing.
Hmm, maybe they just don't like to move their bodies that much. ...That's such a big sand castle. Pretty nice.
Oh, that's awesome.
...Hey, shall we build one like that, too？
(Actually, you wanted to do it, huh？)
▲小早川＊▲. You look good with that swimsuit.
小早川
Whoa... Such lewd eyes...
But it really suits you nicely.
D-Don't make me bully you.
I just want to praise you frankly.
...I get it. Thanks for praising me.
小早川
When you said we should just come here, what did you think we could do？ The water is very cold.
We are lovers, right？ We don't need any special reason to come to the ocean.
Whoa. What's this？
This is getting a little awkward...
...I got it, I got it. Let's take a stroll. I don't really hate it here. At least the weather isn't so hot.
小早川
The off-season ocean feels pretty sad. It's like listening to oldies songs.
Oldies？
It's like Rinko is singing an oldie song with the waves as her background music.
What is this？ For example, what kind of song？
Well, it's...
What！？ You think I'm gonna sing here！？
(▲小早川＊▲ also likes oldies, huh？)
小早川
I think I like the quiet off-season ocean like this.
We can't really do anything here though.
It's good like this.
We can feel at peace just listening to the wave's sound.
...Really. I mean I want my boyfriend to feel inner peace although it's a little boring to be here.
Thanks for that.
Hehe...
小早川
I wonder what these sunfish are thinking.
They look like they're just fooling around all day.
But they might actually think about something very philosophical, like what the universe is, or what life is...
That would be awesome.
Hey, can you at least follow their examples？
小早川
When people go scuba diving, they like to swim along with the sunfish, you know？
Sunfish are huge and obedient so they're the best choice.
For me, I think swimming alongside the sunfish isn't a bad idea.
But it's written here that there are so many parasites on sunfish's skin.
...Then it's good enough to just watch them...
(She changes her mind so quickly...)
小早川
A bird that can't fly, huh...？
What's wrong？
I wonder if it has some kind of inferiority complex.
All kinds of living creatures that live as a group have some kind of complex, I think.
They have to gather to feel safe... Totally not like you who take everything so lightly.
小早川
The penguin's baby is just so cute. It's all gray and fluffy.
Like a plush doll, right？
Right, and penguins are still cute when they grow up. This is such a miracle of nature.
...Somehow, you're quite humble today.
I'm like this occasionally. Let's buy some souvenirs. I want something about penguins.
(She's really humble.)
小早川
This feels as if we are under the sea, huh？
So beautiful, right？
Ah！ Something was just passing by！
What was that？ It was so fast that I couldn't see clearly.
Shall we confirm what it was？ If it comes by again, I will surely know.
(...That means we'll be stuck here for a while, huh？)
小早川
Ah, a school of fish.
That looks amazing.
Hey, in the aquarium, small fish are eaten by bigger fish, right？
I wonder if those tiny fish are shocked when they see their friends being eaten right before their eyes.
"The survival of the fittest," huh？ I don't like it. The smaller ones should be treated with kindness.
小早川
Dolphins are really smart. I think they're the second smartest animal in the world.
Second...？ Then humans are the smartest, right？
No, humans are the third.
Eh！？
The smartest ones are cats. Being cute and smart, they're so perfect.
(▲小早川＊▲'s love for cats is just too extreme...)
小早川
How come the dolphins can jump like that？ There must be some mechanisms.
Yeah, when we watch them this close, the jumps are really wonderful.
They must be quite brawny, even with those cute faces.
Brawny, huh？
Yeah, but they'll have to endure muscular pain after the show. They're professionals.
(...I wonder if they'll have muscular pain...)
小早川
So many couples here. It must really be a famous date spot.
▲小早川＊▲, do you like this place？
Not particularly. It's ordinary.
Ah, cats. There are many cats over there.
...I withdraw my words. I like this place. Hehe.
Are they filming a TV series over there？
小早川
This place has nice scenery. I heard that it's often used as a location for films and series.
They're gone. But... Is there a series that has that cartoon character？
...And I didn't see any camera. Are you sure they're filming a series？
...Don't tell me they're just some weird people...
Ah, there are people skateboarding over there.
小早川
Hey, have you ever tried it？
Yeah, just a little bit.
It might be handy when I'm late for school. What do you think？
It's quite dangerous. You might get hurt...
Don't talk like you're my dad！
小早川
Couples usually enjoy being at some high places, don't you think？ Pretty typical.
Is... that so？ But I guess many date spots with nice scenery are all up in high places, huh？
They just try to build those places at high spots？ Can't people date somewhere closer to the ground？
Well, occasionally, the excitement when we're up this high feels nice, right？
Yes, once in a while. The people that keep going to such places are some boring adults.
The view is nice.
小早川
Since we're already here, how about we try walking around？
Okay, let's go to the spot with the best view.
Hah, sometimes you really act like a kid.
Because I've been waiting for us to be here.
Well, fine then. Ah, don't run, or you'll fall down. Be careful.
(Don't treat me like a kid...)
小早川
When we're actually here, it's much higher up than I had pictured it.
Aren't you scared when you look down like that？
Why？ Were there rumors about accidents or poor construction here？
It's just dangerous...
Then that's no problem. Come on. You should try looking down there too. They won't charge us for it.
小早川
I see. This is the kind of design that girls like, huh？
▲小早川＊▲ is also a girl.
Then let me ask. Among these items, which one would Rinko like？
That's difficult.
Right. Rinko's preference is complicated, unlike those teenagers who copy magazine models or idols.
小早川
...I'm going home.
We have just arrived though.
But why do we have to be here？ There isn't anything that will suit Rinko anyway.
Even if you say so, we can just look around. They won't charge us for looking.
...Okay, it's fine if we just look around...
(You should have more confidence in yourself.)
小早川
A lot of my classmates like to try these items.
Huh？ This is really the world that guys can't understand.
But at least you should understand the feelings of girls who want to become pretty. You have a girlfriend, after all.
Well... In that case, ▲小早川＊▲, you want to become pretty, too？
...Hah, you really don't understand a thing.
小早川
It's so troublesome to be women. Many women can't go outside without putting on make-ups.
▲小早川＊▲, but you don't wear any make-ups, right？
They're not necessary for me.
But you'll start using them someday, right？ I wonder how you'll look.
Don't imagine things on your own！
There are only accessories for girls, huh？
小早川
There seem to be some for guys, too.
Let me see.
Well, whether they will look good on you or not is questionable though.
小早川
Accessories, huh？
Hmm？ Is there any of them that you like？
Not really. I'm not that interested in these items.
But many music artists wear these kinds of items too, right？ Haven't you tried to copy them？
Don't say such a thing as copy. And music is not fashion. Music is the soul. The soul！
小早川
Hmm. It sure is quiet. It's like I'm automatically feeling sleepy when I'm at the lake shore.
Yeah, I'm getting sleepy too.
Wait. Don't say you're getting sleepy while you're on a date with your girlfriend！
But, we can always come back here as many time as we want, right？
Hmm, right... That's true.
小早川
Hey, do you love me？
Why do you ask me that all of a sudden...？
How much do you love me？ As much as the size of this lake？
Let me see... About 10 times the size of this lake.
...You easily answered my question. I was expecting that you'd get more embarrassed. Hehe.
There's a Rent-A-Cycle here.
小早川
Huh？ What is that？
You can rent bicycles to ride around here. ▲小早川＊▲, can you ride a bicycle？
...Are you making fun of me？
Sorry, sorry. Well, do you want to ride it？
I don't know. Do they have a tandem？
小早川
If Rinko fell from here, would you jump down to save Rinko's life？
Of course I'd jump！ By the way, if I fell, would you jump down to save me, ▲小早川＊▲？
Hmm, I'd call others to help you, I think.
What if there weren't people around？
I'd believe in my boyfriend that he'd survive！
小早川
Ah, jumping fish.
Really. That's a lot of them.
Seems like fishing is allowed here.
Fishing, huh？ I think it's such a boring thing to do during a date.
I don't hate fishing, but that's not something we should do. It's a hobby for old people.
小早川
Do you usually get seasick？
I wonder. I don't feel sick now though.
I see. Maybe because this pleasure cruise moves slowly in the lake.
Do you want it to go faster？
Yeah, in that case, I could be nursing you while you got seasick, right？
(I want her to look after me, but I don't want to get sick...)
Yeah, I'm sweating.
Eh？ ▲小早川＊▲, you don't look happy.
小早川
Too hot. I'm tired. My feet hurt.
You'll forget about all these once you reach the peak. Come on. Just keep it up a little longer.
...Why are you so uselessly energetic...？ This is irritating！
(Don't be unreasonable！)
小早川
We have to greet other people when they walk past us on the mountain, huh？
Yeah, that's good manners. ▲小早川＊▲ should greet them, too.
I did greet them！
Did you greet me when we first met？ I can't remember...
S-Shut up！ There was a moment like that for me, but the current Rinko is different！
小早川
Eh...？ Have we been going downhill？
That can't be. There are also people walking around here.
But, look at that signpost... It says this path is going downhill...
Whoa, are you serious？ Now, my excitement has gone downhill as well...
This is boring. You get only 20 points. Anyway, let's go back. Come on.
小早川
This place is full of old people.
Yeah, it's rare for high school couples to come to view maple leaves on a date.
Don't use the word "couples." It's embarrassing...
(Even now...？)
Don't dare thinking "Even now"！
Don't I even have the right to think！？
These maple leaves remind me that it's fall.
小早川
Well, you can say that, but there are these things on the ground as well. Look.
Oh！ Chestnuts！
When we talk about fall, we can't forget about chestnut rice, right？
Right. Are we gonna fight over who gets more chestnuts in the rice？
Of course not！
小早川
Teeheehee. Are you regretting it now that you invited Rinko to ski？
Why？
Because I'm actually very good at skiing, you know？ So good that I might cause the people who ski near me to feel embarrassed.
Don't be too hard on me.
Now then, let's go to the advanced course. Come on. Follow me.
(She didn't listen...)
People say that the 3 levels of ski slopes are like the beauty levels of women. I think that's true.
小早川
Hmm. But that kind of saying doesn't have anything to do with me, right？
▲小早川＊▲, you're a beautiful girl. So, you're like the premium slope.
...Hey, for now, shall we do something besides skiing？
...What？
Snowball！ Fight！
Ouch！
Haha. ▲小早川＊▲, your nose and your face are all red.
小早川
Eh？ Wait. You idiot. Don't look！
But you're cute like that.
Ah... No... Don't say that！
Geez...
小早川
These things aren't related to Rinko at all.
Can you just act a bit like "Heh" or "Oh" or something like that？
Heh.
Oh.
Hah... I don't think we can relate to each other now.
小早川
What is this？ There's only a very big eye on the whole painting.
Its title is... "A glance." So, I guess that's it.
That's what I thought when I first saw it. Yeah, so that's its name.
All right, let's stare back at it.
Don't leave me alone！
小早川
▲小早川＊▲, do you like this painting？ You usually complain about all kinds of paintings here though.
I'm irritated...
Hey, what's wrong？
I hate paintings！ I've never been able to paint them.
(And you're saying that out loud in an art gallery...)
小早川
Wow, so big...
It's different from when we see it in pictures, right？
If it's this big, it can be called a monster. I won't be surprised if it is featured as an enemy in a game.
But it is a herbivore.
...Well, in a game that has a vegetable as a protagonist then. Yeah, it's decided.
(What is decided...？)
小早川
Why does a giraffe have a long neck？
Hm, because...
Because...
Because... Then it will be able to eat you, you cute little girl！
...What was that？ Am I the little red riding hood？
小早川
Lions are in the cat family too, right？ No matter how much they look like cats, they are still a little bit...
Well, their sizes are much different. Lions are really scary...
Without those sharp fangs and nails, they just look like cats.
▲小早川＊▲, you don't have a mane, right？
Huh？ What's that？ Want me to bite your head off！？
小早川
